name: Awesome-Xcode-Plugins
tagline: Awesome Xcode Plugins for easy development process
body:
### Welcome to Awesome Xcode Plugins. This is a Collection of Awesome Xcode Plugins which ease out things needed as a developer ### Install Guide Use [Alcatraz](http://alcatraz.io/), package manager for easier install/un-install of Xcode Plugins ### List of Plugins 1. [KSImageNamed](https://github.com/ksuther/KSImageNamed-Xcode) --- Xcode plug-in that provides autocomplete for imageNamed: calls.

![KSImageNamed](https://github.com/rakii/Awesome-Xcode-Plugins/blob/master/screenshots/KSImageNamed.gif)
2. [ColorSenseRainbow](https://github.com/NorthernRealities/ColorSenseRainbow) --- Plugin for Xcode to make working with colors more visual.

![ColorSenseRainbow](https://github.com/rakii/Awesome-Xcode-Plugins/blob/master/screenshots/ColorSense.png)
3. [Lin](https://github.com/questbeat/Lin) --- Xcode plugin that provides auto-completion for NSLocalizedString..

![Lin](https://github.com/questbeat/Lin/blob/master/screenshot.gif)
4. [SCXcodeSwitchExpander](https://github.com/stefanceriu/SCXcodeSwitchExpander) --- Xcode plugin that enables switch cases autocompletion.

![SCXcodeSwitchExpander](https://github.com/rakii/Awesome-Xcode-Plugins/blob/master/screenshots/SCXcodeSwitchExpander.gif)
5. [VVDocumenter](https://github.com/onevcat/VVDocumenter-Xcode) --- Xcode plug-in which helps you write documentation comment easier, for both Objective-C and Swift.

![VVDocumenter](https://github.com/rakii/Awesome-Xcode-Plugins/blob/master/screenshots/%20VVDocumenter.gif)
6. [XAlign](https://github.com/qfish/XAlign) --- An amazing Xcode plugin to align regular code. it can align anything in any way you want.

![XAlign](https://github.com/rakii/Awesome-Xcode-Plugins/blob/master/screenshots/%20XAlign.gif)
7. [XToDo](https://github.com/trawor/XToDo) --- Xcode plugin to collect and list the `TODO`,`FIXME`.

![XToDo](https://github.com/rakii/Awesome-Xcode-Plugins/blob/master/screenshots/XToDo.png)
8. [CocoaPods for Xcode](https://github.com/kattrali/cocoapods-xcode-plugin) --- Dependency management helper for your CocoaPods, right in Xcode.

![CocoaPods](https://github.com/rakii/Awesome-Xcode-Plugins/blob/master/screenshots/Cocoapods.png)
9. [HOStringSense for Xcode](https://github.com/holtwick/HOStringSense-for-Xcode) --- Plugin for Xcode to make working with strings less "escaped".

![HOStringSense for Xcode](https://github.com/rakii/Awesome-Xcode-Plugins/blob/master/screenshots/HOStringSense.gif)
### Authors and Contributors RamaKrishna (@rakii) Myself currently contributing to the repo. Feel free to fork it while maintaining the quality of the repo. ### Support or Contact Have interesting ideas?? Come let's work together in brings ideas to reality (https://github.com/rakii)
